questions.question: Considering the overall form, what is the primary shape of the product container?
What color is the predominant visible liquid within the bottle?
Describe the material of the bottle's main body, based on visual assessment?
What color is the cap or lid affixed to the top of the bottle?
What appears to be the material of the bottle's cap?
What is the overall style of the product's label?
Disregarding any text, what is the general color scheme of the label?
Based purely on visual characteristics, what is the texture of the bottle?
Considering the label's layout, is it primarily text-heavy or graphic-heavy?
Is there any noticeable embossing, etching, or other surface treatments on the bottle itself?
From a visual standpoint, what seems to be the product's intended function or category?
Does the bottle exhibit any noticeable imperfections or irregularities on its surface?
Observing the base of the bottle, what is its general shape?
Describe the apparent clarity or translucency of the bottle's glass.
Looking at the label, are there any noticeable symbols or icons besides text?
